name: DeathBall #LD41
description:
This game is my first solo Ludum Dare entry! Hi, i'm Andrea Di Bartolo, 3d Arist currently working for Shoppe Keep 2, for this ludum dare i tried to develop a game all by myself and with very little coding experience so i came up with Deathball!

Deathball is a combination between FPS and Football game, in this game evil robots will try to kill you and you can defend yourself only using a football! Score points killing enemies and scoring goals while avoding taking too much damage.

Controls

W A S D/ ARROWS = Move around

Space = Jump

Left Click = Kick the football

Right Click = Freeze the football

Middle Click = Respawn the football in front of you (4 seconds cooldown)

Ludum Dare submission: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/deathball
